Verses: 1 nammudaiya Dhevanum Ratchagarumaayirukkira Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Needhiyaal Engalaippola Arumaiyaana Visuvaasaththaip Petravargalukku, Yesukiristhuvin Oozhiyakkaaranum Apposthalanumaagiya Seemon Pedhuru Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu:
2 dhevanaiyum Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesuvaiyum Arigira Arivinaal Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Perugakkadavadhu.

3 thammudaiya Magimaiyinaalum Kaaruniyaththinaalum Nammai Azhaiththavarai Arigira Arivinaale Jeevanukkum Dhevabakthikkum Vendiya Yaavatraiyum. Avarudaiya Dhivviya Vallamaiyaanadhu Namakkuth Thandharulinadhumandri,

4 ichchaiyinaal Ulagaththilundaana Kettukkuth Thappi, Dhivviya Subaavaththukkup Pangullavargalaagumporuttu, Magaa Menmaiyum Arumaiyumaana Vaakkuththaththangalum Avaigalinaale Namakku Alikkappattirukkiradhu.
5 ippadiyirukka, Neengal Adhiga Jaakkiradhaiyullavargalaai Ungal Visuvaasaththode Thairiyaththaiyum, Thairiyaththode Gnaanaththaiyum,
6 gnaanaththode Ichchaiyadakkaththaiyum, Ichchaiyatakkaththode Porumaiyaiyum, Porumaiyode Thevabakthiyaiyum,
7 dhevabakthiyode Sagodhara Sinegaththaiyum, Sagodhara Sinegaththode Anbaiyum Kootti Vazhangungal.
8 ivaigal Ungalukku Undaayirundhu Peruginaal, Ungalai Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvai Arigira Arivile Veenarum Kaniyatravargalumaayirukkavottaadhu.
9 ivaigal Illaadhavan Evano, Avan Munseydha Paavangalarath Thaan Suththigarikkappattadhai Marandhu Kansorugippona Kurudanaayirukkiraan.
10 aagaiyaal, Sagodharare, Ungal Azhaippaiyum Therindhukolludhalaiyum Urudhiyaakkumpadi Jaakkiradhaiyaayirungal; Ivaigalai Seydhaal Neengal Orukkaalum Idarivizhuvadhillai.
11  Ivvidhamaai, Nammudaiya Karththarum Ratchakarumaagiya Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Niththiya Raajyaththukkutpatumpiravesam Ungalukkup Paribooranamaai Alikkappadum.
12 idhinimiththam, Ivaigalai Neengal Arindhum, Neengal Ippozhudhu Arindhirukkira Saththiyaththil Urudhippattirundhum, Ungalukku Ivaigalai Eppozhudhum Ninaippootta Naan Asadhiyaayiren.
13 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhu Enakku Ariviththapadi Naan En Koodaaraththaivittuppovadhu Seekkiraththil Neridumendru Arindhu,
14 indhak Koodaaraththil Naan Irukkumalavum Ungalai Ninaippootti Ezhuppividuvadhu Niyaayamendru Ennugiren.
15 melum, Naan Sendruponapinbu Ivaigalai Neengal Eppozhudhum Ninaiththukkolla Edhuvundaayirukkumpadi Pirayaththanampannuven.

16 naangal Thandhiramaana Kattukkadhaikalaip Pinpatrinavargalaaga Alla, Avarudaiya Magaththuvaththaik Kannaarak Kandavargalaagave Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Vallamaiyaiyum Varugaiyaiyum Ungalukku Ariviththom.

17 ivar Ennudaiya Nesakumaaran, Ivaridaththil Piriyamaayirukkiren Endru Sollugira Saththam Unnadhamaana Magimaiyilirundhu Avarukku Undaagi, Pithaavaagiya Dhevanaal Avar Ganaththaiyum Magimaiyaiyum Petrapodhu,
18 avarodekooda Naangal Parisuththa Paruvadhaththilirukkaiyil, Vaanaththilirundhu Pirandha Andhach Saththaththaikkettom.

19 adhiga Urudhiyaana Theerkkadharisanamum Namakku Undu; Pozhudhuvidindhu Vidivelli Ungal Irudhayangalil Udhikkumalavum Irululla Sthalaththil Piragaasikkira Vilakkaippondra Avvasanaththaik Kavaniththiruppadhu Nalamaayirukkum.
20 vedhaththilulla Endhath Theerkkadharisanamum Suyathotramaana Porulaiyudaiyadhaayiraadhendru Neengal Mundhi Ariyavendiyadhu.
21 theerkkadharisanamaanadhu Orukaalaththilum Manusharudaiya Siththaththinaale Undaagavillai; Dhevanudaiya Parisuththa Manushargal Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Evappattup Pesinaargal.
